text: Hugo Duminil-Copin (born 26 August 1985) is a French mathematician. His works focused in probability theory. He was awarded the Fields Medal in 2022. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 2019. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Fields Medalists Category:French mathematicians Category:French academics Category:Members of Academia Europaea
title: Hugo Duminil-Copin
